alert.note: Alert for Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 2:16AM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Plymouth and Woodbury Counties. In Nebraska, Dixon and Dakota Counties. In South Dakota, Union County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Patchy and localized blowing snow is possible in locations that receive snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Quickly falling temperatures could result in flash freeze conditions on area roads and sidewalks.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
